Articles.Content:
Planes, Tanks, Boats fights and much more is coming.

Large scale battles, with weapons mods and AI fighting against each other.

Here are the first two videos.

Kerbal Thunder - Air Battles:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Lznb6aXctwc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Kerbal Thunder - Tanks Battles:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2M0MhjZthGg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Kerbal Thunder - Naval Strike:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/K33kzb_K0MM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-11T18:29:29Z" title="06/11/2015 06:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 11, 2015</time> by Space Scumbag**
These are really good, I especially love the dogfight

I have been watching your videos since your first compilation of random clips episodes. The quality of your work is only improving.

I really liked how destruction FX made it look like their ammo magazines were exploding.

Unrelated: Since I know you like star wars have you seen my semi decent attempt at making general grievous' unicycle?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-12T02:23:22Z" title="06/12/2015 02:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 12, 2015</time> by Jon144**

> 
> I have been watching your videos since your first compilation of random clips episodes. The quality of your work is only improving.
> I really liked how destruction FX made it look like their ammo magazines were exploding.
> 
> Unrelated: Since I know you like star wars have you seen my semi decent attempt at making general grievous' unicycle?

Very creative and cool craft. I like it, and I know how hard it is with only stock KSP.

I challenge you to do the P-1112 Aigaion! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![ZAXYndD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ZAXYndD.jpg)
Finally, we might see the first space battle performed using BD Armory guard mode!
Ideas for the next vid? Combined air and ground forces battle? Or do a remake of the Preparation for landing on Hokkaido map, as terrible a map as it is.

[Download for the ship craft files.](http://www./download/k43jsfwg69k1u11/Ships.zip)

Don't forget the mods. You will find the list in the video description.
